call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - January 2nd 2025

topics.title: Sub-blocks CEP Development Progress
topics.summary: Kushti is working on the sub-blocks CEP proposal, focusing on transaction packing, state updates, and transaction ordering rules. He expects to present the proposal within days and estimates that 99% of transactions could be confirmed immediately with ordering blocks every two minutes.

topics.title: Storage Rent Collection and PHP Token Launch
topics.summary: Sigmanauts mining DAO discovered a PHP meme token during storage rent collection from a 4-year-old box and is relaunching it. The concept involves recycling old tokens that get destroyed when boxes can't pay storage rent after 4 years.

topics.title: Mining Pool Token Discovery and Rewards
topics.summary: The Sigmanauts mining pool found a token within 69 minutes of 2025, triggering a 50 ERG bonus distribution. The reward includes Paideia and Bober tokens being distributed to current miners.

topics.title: Cyberverse Gaming Update and Cross-chain Expansion
topics.summary: Cyberverse now runs smoothly on handheld gaming devices with controller mapping, and they're launching a Ronin network mint on January 6th following their competition win. The game currently has nearly 100 live players.

topics.title: 2025 Development Roadmap Discussion
topics.summary: Kushti outlines plans for peer-to-peer digital free banking including uncensorable on-ramps, cross-chain swaps, and layer 2 solutions. The roadmap includes new stablecoin development, silver oracles, and lithium tokenization projects.

topics.title: Physical Goods Marketplace Experience
topics.summary: Discussion of successful Mac computer sales through MewMart, highlighting the benefits of smart contract payments over traditional payment methods. Sellers appreciate the finality and non-reversible nature of blockchain transactions.

topics.title: Escrow Systems and Fundraising Improvements
topics.summary: Proposal for milestone-based escrow fundraising to prevent project abandonment after funding. Sigmanauts treasury could serve as an escrow service for community projects with milestone-based token releases.

topics.title: Cryptocurrency Adoption and Influencer Dynamics
topics.summary: Discussion of increased interest in decentralized communities and conversations with influencers seeking legitimate blockchain projects. Kushti emphasizes the challenge of maintaining decentralization while growing adoption and avoiding corruption.

topics.title: Multi-signature Wallet Options and Privacy
topics.summary: Comprehensive overview of Ergo's multi-sig solutions including Minotaur v2, Moria web-based multi-sig, and Zero Knowledge Treasury. Ergo's threshold signatures preserve privacy by not revealing which specific signers participated in transactions.

topics.title: Community Q&A and Personal Reflections
topics.summary: Q&A session covering mixer functionality, team member status, and philosophical discussion about crypto's mission. Both speakers reflect on gratitude for participating in the financial revolution and fighting against traditional banking systems.
